name: The Decanter Occasional Table
description: Part of Davidson's Wanderlust Collection, the Decanter Occasional Table represents the very best of cutting-edge contemporary British furniture design. Perfect for those looking to add a splash of colour to their space. The Decanter is offered in an extensive range of high gloss and satin lacquers. However, it's just as impressive in one of Davidson's signature timber finishes, too. Crafted with close attention to detail, this eye-catching table features an ultra-slim top, standing atop a decanter-shaped base, designed to add a touch of sophistication to any area. It is available in a standard size, specifically designed for use as an occasional table. Although, bespoke sizing possible upon request.
